chat.msg: ¡genial! Veo una ramita cerca de nuestro punto de partida que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre.
ha ha! good try, but I think there is no Peru on this map, friend
Shall we go to the island of the tiger, the butterfly, the parrot or the elephant?
¡ey ey! rumbo al suroeste hacia la isla grande con el loro hablador
¡ups! parece que es un camino sin salida
Necesitaríamos volver a la isla con el loro, ¿estás seguro?
okay, back to the tiger again
okay, let's fly southeast where the three rocks take us to the little frog
From here, where do we go?
Bueno, ¡en marcha! desde la ubicación de la jirafa, yendo al sureste para encontrarnos con nuestra resbaladiza amiga, la serpiente
ooh, a change of route! left from the crocodile, back to our big friend, the elephant
hmm, I don't see any spiders on the map
hmm, still no tarantulas on the map
maybe you meant the treasure? my spanish may be a little rusty
tampoco hay ninguna araña en este mapa
¿Quizás quisiste enviarme a otra área? tal vez el tesoro?
jaja, tampoco hay escarabajos en este mapa amigo
¿Quizás te refieres al siguiente paso en este camino?
déjame ver: tigre, mariposa, loro, elefante, rana, cocodrilo, jirafa y serpiente
Well, we've already been there, but I can try again to go back to the parrot
we are on parrot island right now, you can't go directly to butterfly island from here
De regreso a la isla del tigre nuevamente. ¿próximo paso?
that's what I mean! heading southeast to meet the butterfly, and now?
Good choices! Flying southeast, I greet the three rocks on my way to Frog Island
Desde aquí puedo volver con el tigre, encontrarme con el cocodrilo o regresar con el elefante.
It's time to take a leap, friend! we go back to the left, hello again elephant, and then
mira eso! viajando al oeste, el largo cuello de la jirafa es mi próxima parada
¡ahí vamos! un paseo al sureste, nos encontramos con la serpiente
¡ahí vamos! dos pasos al este y estamos en el tesoro
hola, q tal? ready to start?
perfect! stand next to the white dog, facing the wooden bench. go straight ahead crossing the trail and walk towards the florist stand
but don't reach it! make a quick left u-turn before you get there. got it?
cool, now head back across the trail the way you came, towards our white dog friend
cross the wooden branch towards the south, going downwards. spot another white dog near a picnic?
¡si eso es! Ahora, revisa la alfombra de picnic, asegurándote de tocar el cuenco de bayas.
Mira hacia adelante para ver otra rama de madera sobre el río.
¡lindo! Evite el arbusto verde, rodéelo desde la derecha y siga dirigiéndose hacia el puesto de floristería.
good job! now turn left and go down under the flower shop towards the big bridge with two people riding a bicycle
¡impresionante! Ahora continúe pasando los ciclistas y el puente, en dirección oeste.
Hay dos ancianos en un banco. ¿puedes detectarlos?
excellent, now move a little to the south, between the old men and a branch of wood
¡genial! ¿Puedes ver un arbusto verde? debería estar cerca del final de la rama que acabas de pasar
nice one! okay, look east now
you need to go between the wooden branch and the green bush. can you do that?
¡perfecto! Ahora da unos pasos hacia el este y mantente alerta.
¡perfecto! párate junto al perro blanco y mira hacia el banco de madera. Ahora continúa recto cruzando el sendero hasta que veas un puesto de floristería.
pero no lo alcances, ¿vale? gire en U a la izquierda antes de llegar allí. ¿entiendo?
great, now retrace your steps, cross the path in the direction you came, back towards the white dog
¡Eso es! ahora cruzalo hacia el sur y continúa hacia abajo
¿ves otro perro blanco cerca de un picnic?
great, now step on the picnic blanket, but be sure to touch the fruit bowl
awesome, now look ahead to see another wooden branch crossing the river
nice, now once you crossed, spot the green bush and avoid touching it, go around it from the right side and head towards the florist stand
super! now, make a left turn and go below the florist stand towards the big bridge with the couple on bicycles
great, now move on past the cyclists and the bridge, heading west
¡perfecto! deberías ver a dos personas mayores en un banco
excellent, now move a bit to the south, between the old folks and a wooden branch
great, now look for a green bush next to the end of the branch you just passed by
cool, now head there and swiftly move eastwards between the branch and the bush
Excelente, ahora avanza unos pasos hacia el este y mantente atento a
Do you see a young, brown deer?
yes before the river and fish
¡eso es todo! Bien hecho mi amigo
hi there! que comience el juego!!
of course! I'm seeing the dog south of the store, by the fire
Veo un hongo rojo y un auto azul. ¿Adónde vamos ahora?
al telescope azul mas a sur
¡genial! estoy en el telescopio azul hacia el sur
perfecto, estoy pasando las rocas y acercándome a la casa de madera
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
brilliant! well, you are at the starting point next to the three palm trees, right?
great! now, head towards the first palm tree to your south-west
after bypassing it, take a quick right turn and stroll past the second palm tree. when you see the third tree, make an abrupt left and proceed south
No, no todavía. pronto verás un cachorro marrón
vire ligeramente a la izquierda, luego siga recto y gire ligeramente a la derecha hacia el sur. ¡sigue adelante!
nice! now you will see two rocks
Cross between them and you will reach the water's edge. you see them?
great! go ahead, dip your toes in the water and start walking towards the large red crab you see in there
once you're near it, turn right and continue westward with the big rock by your side
you're doing amazing! soon, you'll come across a medium-sized rock
just keep going until you spot a shark in the water
ok, now it's time for a sharp right turn
be careful not to get too close to the shark!
Super good! now head back to earth
you will see a blue-yellow-white ball and the medium rock you just walked past
i need you to navigate between these two. keep walking north after that
perfecto! bends lightly to the left and continues northwest
you will see a red tent to your left and a large speaker to your right
just go ahead between the two
now curve around the tent in an arc
now head south towards the sea but stop right before you hit the water
Genial, ve a la derecha y camina debajo.
¡estás casi allí! girar 90 grados a la derecha (hacia el norte) y seguir al lado del kayak
you should now be near a small green bush
fantastic! you did it buddy, that's the end of our path! great job on following all the twists and turns!
ajá, eso fue divertido, ¿no? ¡Gracias por seguir el juego!
brilliant! It's always fun to play these games with you
¡impresionante! ¡cuídate y que tengas un gran día!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
